CastAway:LosingYourself.NAME: Losing Yourself
CastAway:LosingYourself.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !CastAway:DECK_EXHAUST! random cards from your draw pile. NL Gain !M! castaway:Lost. NL Exhaust
CastAway:LosingYourself.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !CastAway:DECK_EXHAUST! cards from your draw pile. NL Gain !M! castaway:Lost. NL Exhaust

CastAway:ProtectAll.NAME: Protect All
CastAway:ProtectAll.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Draw until your hand is full. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
CastAway:ProtectAll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Draw until your hand is full. NL Gain !M! Strength.

CastAway:Throw.NAME: Throw
CastAway:Throw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! castaway:Damage. NL Discard !M! cards. NL Deal !CastAway:SECOND_DAMAGE! castaway:Burning 2 times.

CastAway:InstantFeedback.NAME: Instant Feedback
CastAway:InstantFeedback.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! castaway:Burning to a random enemy for each card you draw, except Turn Start.

CastAway:CutLoose.NAME: Cut Loose
CastAway:CutLoose.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! castaway:Burning to all enemies for each card in your hand. Discard !M!. Draw !M!.

CastAway:LostSouls.NAME: Lost Souls
CastAway:LostSouls.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! castaway:Burning for each card in your discard pile that says Exhaust or Discard.

CastAway:HealingGift.NAME: Healing Gift
CastAway:HealingGift.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards from your hand. NL Heal !M! for each card. NL Exhaust.

CastAway:CleanseMe.NAME: Cleanse
CastAway:CleanseMe.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Remove all debuffs.
